Package eu.tivian.musico.ui

Fragment and UI related classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlbumsFragment
    Displays the albums list.
    CustomScannerActivity
    Custom scanner activity extending from Activity to display a custom layout form scanner view.
    LastFmFragment
    Fragment displaying information about the Last.fm user.
    LastFmStatsFragment
    Fragment used to display recent tracks or top artists of given Last.fm user.
    ScreenSlidePagerAdapter
    Adapter used by ViewPager2 to display all 3 fragments.
    SettingsDialogFragment
    Setting dialog.
    SquareImageView
    Special version of ImageView which forces itself to stay in square proportions.
    StatisticsFragment
    Fragment containing statistics about the collection database.

Package eu.tivian.musico.ui Description

Fragment and UI related classes.
